entry.title: State of Sorbet May 2019
entry.summary: Stripe uses Ruby extensively[1]. It’s the main language we use to build the business logic behind our APIs, and our Ruby codebase is on the order of millions of lines of code. At that scale and with our expected rapid growth rate two things are true: ...
